Banker, Business Job at Stanbic IBTC Bank




        
    

        
        Stanbic IBTC Bank is a leading African banking group focused on emerging markets globally. It has been a mainstay of South Africa's financial system for 150 years, and now spans 16 countries across the African continent.

Standard Bank is a firm believer in technical innovation, to help us guarantee exceptional client service and leading edge financial solutions. Our growing global success reflects our commitment to the latest solutions, the best people, and a uniquely flexible and vibrant working culture. To help us drive our success into the future, we are looking for resourceful individuals to join our dedicated team at our offices.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Banker, Business
     

            
    



Job Ref ID: 80436409A-0001
Job Location: Kaduna
Job Type: Full-time
Business Segment: Business & Commercial Banking

Job Description


	Stanbic IBTC is positioned to continue to build capacity and create a sustainable talent pipeline within the organization.
	The organization is running a recruitment exercise for Relationship Managers to manage its existing portfolio of clients, while onboarding new clients/businesses.
	The key responsibilities listed below, show the required knowledge for sales and relationship management roles.
	Please send in your application if you have any knowledge of or interests in managing relationships and if you meet all the criteria required for this role.


Qualifications


	First degree in any field.
	Minimum of 3 - 6 years of experience
	Cognate experience in sales and relationship management of customers to be able to drive profitability and build relationships
	Experience within the financial industry with experience in managing small businesses.


Additional Information
Behavioural Competencies:


	Generating Ideas
	Developing Strategies
	Interpreting Data
	Convincing People
	Team Working


Technical Competencies:


	Customer Understanding
	Product Knowledge
	Application and Submission Verification
	Account opening and maintenance
	Product Related Systems

Supermarket Store Manager Job at Stratom Concept Limited




        
    

        
        Stratom Concept Limited is a fast-growing multi-sector company with operations across the retail, pharmaceutical, beauty, and wellness industries. We are committed to delivering premium products and services through our network of salons, pharmacies, supermarkets, and event spaces across Nigeria.

We prioritize operational excellence, customer satisfaction, and continuous innovation. Our team consists of passionate professionals dedicated to creating outstanding experiences for our customers while driving sustainable business growth.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Supermarket Store Manager

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time
     

            
    



Job Description


	We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven Supermarket manager to oversee daily operations, drive sales growth and esnure smooth functioning of our supermarket.


Key Responsibilities


	Oversee day-to-day operations of the supermarket.
	Manage staff sceduling, supervision and performance
	Implement ffective merchandising and inventory management processes.
	Monitor stock levels, reduce wastage and ensure timely replenishment
	Drive sales growth through customer engagement and promotions
	Ensure compliance with health, safety and hygiene standards.
	Prepare and analyse sales, expense and performance reports.
	Lead motivate and train staff to deliver execptional customer service.


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree / HND in Business Administration, Management or related filed
	3-5 years of experience in Retail store management and at least 1 year in Leadership.
	Proven experience in inventory management and stock control
	Strong leadership, organizational and problem-solving skills
	Proficiency in POS/Inventory management systems.


Benefits


	Competitve Salary
	HMO Coverage
	Growth and career development opportunities.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to: stratomrecruitment@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
